_header: Christ cried when He prayed forgiveness of our sin
_description: Christ’s tears — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Crist criȝede wan he preyȝede forȝefnesse of oure
                    senneCrist criȝede wan he þristede þe helthe of
                    mankenneCrist criȝede wan he þolede harde peynes an woCrist
                    criȝede wan his soule fro þe bodi sulde go
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 34.
